extendedIngredients.name: cucumbers
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 pound organic Persian cucumbers, washed, ends trimmed and sliced into 他" rounds

extendedIngredients.name: dill
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 tablespoons fresh dill leaves plus more for garnish

extendedIngredients.name: salmon
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 ounces pre-sliced Wild Smoked Salmon (See NOTES)

recipes.title: Persian Cucumber Bites with Lox + Dill Cream Cheese
recipes.instructions: Clean cucumbers, trim ends and evenly cut into 他" rounds.Cut the smoked salmon into evenly sized pieces so that they will fit on top of the cucumber rounds. Place the cucumber rounds on a serving tray and top with the salmon pieces. Use up all the salmon. I put about two pieces per cucumber round.Combine the cream cheese, dill leaves, salt and pepper in the body of a food processor or blender. Process until well combined and softened.Use a piping bag (I used Wilton Tip #21) to evenly distribute the Dill Cream Cheese onto the rounds. (See NOTES if you do not have a piping bag).Finish by placing a small sprig of fresh dill on top of each round and refrigerate until ready to use. Serve and Enjoy!

steps.step: Clean cucumbers, trim ends and evenly cut into 他" rounds.
Cut the smoked salmon into evenly sized pieces so that they will fit on top of the cucumber rounds.
Place the cucumber rounds on a serving tray and top with the salmon pieces. Use up all the salmon. I put about two pieces per cucumber round.

Combine the cream cheese, dill leaves, salt and pepper in the body of a food processor or blender. Process until well combined and softened.Use a piping bag (I used Wilton Tip #21) to evenly distribute the Dill Cream Cheese onto the rounds. (See NOTES if you do not have a piping bag).Finish by placing a small sprig of fresh dill on top of each round and refrigerate until ready to use.
